name: Soul Hopper (Jaya)
description:
Posses objects in the world to complete puzzles with limited possessions. Try different strategies to complete the levels in the most efficient manner.

Updates:

Version 0.2

  • Fixed bug that allowed phasing through some walls
  • Improved collision detection

Version 0.1

  • Heavily upgraded visuals
  • Added Effects for actions
  • New Level!
  • Added Main Menu
